name: Whisper
description: Designed in the early nineties, it still holds up well as a contemporary calligraphic script with non-Roman script capitals. It has an a strong italic with angular strokes and a warm, flowing look. Use Whisper for situations that call for a strong elegance. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/whisper .
author: Robert Leuschke
